chinese: 经常账户适合企业主和交易频繁的人士
english: A Current Account suits business owners and those with frequent transactions
and an overdraft facility for flexibility

chinese: 储蓄账户是为个人储蓄服务的
english: a Savings Account caters to personal savings

chinese: 虽然有限的交易鼓励持续的储蓄
english: though limited transactions encourage consistent saving
